Passé composé (Present Perfect).J'ai dû: I had to / I must have
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Tu as dû: You had to / You must have
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Il/Elle a dû: He/She had to / He/She must have
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Nous avons dû: We had to / We must have
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Vous avez dû: You had to / You must have (formal)
Passé composé (Present Perfect).Ils/Elles ont dû: They had to / They must have
